articles.description: Fishers who reeled in the swordfish said they regularly catch fish with cookiecutter shark bites, but this is the first time they have seen a creature covered in dozens of fresh, oozing wounds.

Fishers hauled in a swordfish (Xiphias gladius) covered in dozens of cookiecutter shark bites. (Image credit: Courtesy of TK Walker (screenshot from YouTube))
